metadata.name: DLL Loaded via CertOC.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects when a user installs certificates by using CertOC.exe to loads the target DLL file.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\certoc.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('certoc.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -loaddll ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /loaddll ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –loaddll ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —loaddll ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―loaddll '))))

output.summary: Detects when a user installs certificates by using CertOC.exe to loads the target DLL file.

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.cmd_line, process.parent_process.cmd_line False positive: Unknown References: https://twitter.com/sblmsrsn/status/1445758411803480072?s=20, https://github.com/elastic/protections-artifacts/commit/746086721fd385d9f5c6647cada1788db4aea95f#diff-fe98e74189873d6df72a15df2eaa0315c59ba9cdaca93ecd68afc4ea09194ef2, https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/Certoc/
